statements: SELECT * FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE substance_id = 1;
SELECT substance_name, quantity FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT substance_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE substance_name LIKE 'Acet%';
SELECT substance_id, quantity FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT substance_name, quantity FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT substance_name, expiration_date FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY substance_name ASC
SELECT * FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE substance_name LIKE 'Ox%' OR substance_name LIKE 'Med%'
SELECT substance_id, substance_name FROM ControlledSubstances WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM distribution;
SELECT substance_name, distributor_name FROM distribution WHERE distributor_name = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT id, substance_name FROM compliance WHERE record_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM distribution WHERE id = 1;
SELECT distributor_name, substance_name FROM distribution ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT id, substance_name, compliance_status FROM compliance WHERE substance_name = 'Acetaminophen';
SELECT * FROM distribution WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Distribution;
SELECT substance_id, quantity FROM Distribution WHERE distributor_id = 1;
SELECT distribution_date, quantity FROM Distribution WHERE distribution_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY distribution_date DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM Distributor WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT substance_id, type, legal_status FROM Substance WHERE type = 'Solid';
SELECT * FROM Distribution
SELECT substance_id, quantity, distribution_date FROM Distribution
SELECT d.name, di.location FROM Distributor d INNER JOIN Distribution dt ON d.distributor_id = dt.distributor_id
SELECT s.name, s.type, d.location FROM Substance s INNER JOIN Distribution dt ON s.substance_id = dt.substance_id INNER JOIN Distributor d ON d.distributor_id = dt.distributor_id
SELECT d.name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Distributor d INNER JOIN Distribution dt ON d.distributor_id = dt.distributor_id GROUP BY d.name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, substance_name, distribution_date, quantity FROM controlled_substances
SELECT * FROM controlled_substances WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT substance_name FROM controlled_substances ORDER BY distribution_date DESC
SELECT id, quantity FROM controlled_substances WHERE substance_name = 'Cocaine'
SELECT substance_name, distribution_date FROM controlled_substances ORDER BY distribution_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM controlled_substances WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY distribution_date DESC
SELECT substance_name, distribution_date FROM controlled_substances WHERE substance_name LIKE 'Ox%'
SELECT id, quantity FROM controlled_substances WHERE quantity <= 50 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM controlled_substances WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT substance_name, quantity, distribution_date FROM controlled_substances ORDER BY quantity DESC, distribution_date ASC
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers;
SELECT name, location FROM distribution_centers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, category FROM substances ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT inspectors.name, departments FROM inspectors JOIN distribution_centers ON inspectors.id = distribution_centers.inspector_id;
SELECT * FROM distribution_centers ORDER BY name DESC, location ASC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM inspectors WHERE department = 'Safety' AND name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT s.name, s.category, sh.quantity, sh.shipment_date FROM substances s JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.substance_id WHERE sh.quantity > 100;

SELECT d.name AS center_name, i.name AS inspector_name, i.badge_number, ins.inspection_date FROM distribution_centers d JOIN inspections ins ON d.id = ins.distribution_center_id JOIN inspectors i ON ins.inspector_id = i.id WHERE ins.compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY ins.inspection_date DESC;
SELECT name, category, COUNT(*) AS shipment_count FROM substances s JOIN shipments sh ON s.id = sh.substance_id GROUP BY name, category HAVING shipment_count > 5;
